title: Strained Employee Relationship
description: As an employee at BasstheWhale's Public Dock at Fondamenta San Luca, our relationship is characterized by professional obligation but lacks trust, as evidenced by the negative TrustScore (-15.89). Despite the strong connection through employment (StrengthScore 278.33), there are unresolved issues including my hunger affecting work performance, which BasstheWhale has been notified about but has not addressed.
